basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period May-June
basic.color: Flower color light purple, fruit color dark brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Resistant to shade, grows in places with scattered light or shade properly
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning accordingly for any favorate tree shapes
